programme.title: Ismi Solehah Ep05

programme.title: SMK S2 Ep02

programme.title: SMK S2 Ep03

programme.title: Kampung Boy S2 Ep08

programme.title: Rimau Bangku Ep05

programme.title: Tumbal The Ritual
programme.desc: Lima anak muda mencabar kemampuan diri mereka apabila memutuskan untuk melakukan penggambaran filem seram di kilang gula berhantu.

programme.title: Cara Mengundang Hantu
programme.desc: Empat cerita seram dan unik tentang menghadapi akibat hasil dari perbuatan buruk anda.

programme.title: Senario Ops Pocot
programme.desc: Pelbagai kejadian lucu ditempuhi oleh 3 pemuda yang mendaftarkan diri di kem RELA untuk mengubah hidup mereka. Lakonan Azli, Wahid & Mazlan.

programme.title: Citra Exclusive: Hari Terakhir Seorang Pengurus
programme.desc: Kisah seorang pengurus yang tertekan dengan bebanan kerja mengambil keputusan untuk membunuh diri untuk memberi pengajaran kepada majikannya

programme.title: Senario Ops Pocot
programme.desc: Pelbagai kejadian lucu ditempuhi oleh 3 pemuda yang mendaftarkan diri di kem RELA untuk mengubah hidup mereka. Lakonan Azli, Wahid & Mazlan.

programme.title: Kupilih Jalanku Sendiri

programme.title: Citra Exclusive: Pengantin Lari Culik Artis

programme.title: Aku Tak Gila
programme.desc: Seorang gadis pernah diculik dan diseksa sewaktu kecil. Tidak mampu melupakan kisah silamnya sehingga dewasa, dia merancang untuk membalas dendam terhadap semua orang yang pernah menzalimi dirinya.

programme.title: Special Clip i-Tanggang Ep07
programme.desc: Special Clip episod 8. Saksikan drama bersiri i-Tanggang setiap Isnin, 9 malam di saluran Astro Citra 108.

programme.title: Dancing In The Rain
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki penghidap autisme memulakan persahabatan yang indah bersama seseorang. Ketika mereka mula dewasa, satu peristiwa tragis terjadi yang hampir menghancurkan persahabatan mereka.

programme.title: Senario Asam Garam

programme.title: Wira
programme.desc: Setelah menyempurnakan khidmat untuk negara, Hassan seorang bekas tentera telah kembali demi keluarganya dan untuk menyelesaikan hutang adiknya Zain.

programme.title: i-Tanggang Ep08
programme.desc: Harris meneruskan penyiasatannya & mendapati Erma mempunyai seorang kawan lama bernama Indah. Esra & Syafiq cuba selamatkan Khalil daripada Erma, namun tanpa sengaja tragedi berlaku.

programme.title: Sembilan Ep08

programme.title: Kamar Seksa
programme.desc: 2 kisah di dalam 1 filem. Kisah pertama mengenai pembantu rumah cuba untuk melepaskan diri dari majikannya. Kisah kedua mengenai isteri yang perlu bekerja menampung keluarga selepas suaminya dibuang kerja.

programme.title: Karya 12-Lampu Merah
programme.desc: Si lelaki sukakan si perempuan, tanpa sedar yang si perempuan itu psiko dan obses dengan cintanya. Cara untuk selamatkan diri hanya dengan jatuh cinta dengan si perempuan semula.

programme.title: Musnahkan Pelamin Anganku
programme.desc: Mikael yang merupakan seorang wedding planner menerima tawaran besar untuk menjayakan sebuah majlis perkahwinan pelanggannya. Namun majlis perkahwinan tersebut merupakan majlis bekas isterinya.

programme.title: Artis Lari Culik Pengantin Lah Pulak

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: A motorcycle workshop owner feels compelled to damn the physical and legal consequences and go on racing.

programme.title: Lady of the Law
programme.desc: One of director Shen Chiang's last works, this action-packed adventure features a lone female fighter, decades before the dawn of pro-feminist kung fu films.

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: A grateful convict becomes his prison officer's defender after he learns that the officer's restaurant has been taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: Vengeance of a Snow Girl
programme.desc: Enjoy Lo Wei's very last Shaw Brothers film, the fabulous tale featuring Li Ching of a frostbitten swordswoman out to get her parents' murderers.

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Screen idol Derek Yee is the ambitious 'Meteor' master who becomes obsessed with sword supremacy and goes on a selfish rampage of violence and sex.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: This intriguing action flick blends westerns and detective films in its martial arts mainline, depicting a tale of vigilante justice versus the law.

programme.title: Duel for Gold
programme.desc: Famed director Chor Yuen has three pairs of cunning crooks on a quest to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House but one is undercover.

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: After a young mother and her husband die, one child is sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: The Knight of Knights
programme.desc: In seeking to avenge his six comrades' murders, a swordsman must battle against Qiao Qing Monastery's notorious monks.

programme.title: Till the End of Time
programme.desc: A singer struggles against the odds to keep her career and marriage intact. Starring Jenny Hu, Peter Chen Ho.

programme.title: The Iron Buddha
programme.desc: Veteran director Yen Chun excels in this tale of the Dragon Sword and the evil Security Agency, beautiful swordswomen and bandits who want it.

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays a beauty tricked into sacrificing herself for the good of the Chinese people. However, the truth is revealed too late.

programme.title: The Silent Swordsman
programme.desc: The great martial clans of China seek to meet with the new Sun and Moon Sect leader and hatch a plan to resist invaders from the west.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: This Inoue Umetsugu musical depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching Ping and Pai Hung.

programme.title: Trilogy of Swordsmanship
programme.desc: It's three times the substance, style and stars, in this amazing motion picture featuring the work of three of Shaw Brother's finest martial arts directors.

programme.title: Facets of Love
programme.desc: In this king of epic dramas, three sexy vignettes are set against a Ming Dynasty brothel that steams with erotic myths, secret trysts and pleasurable twists.

programme.title: Moods of Love
programme.desc: How far would you go for love? Or lust? These are the questions posed in two, sinfully entertaining Sung Dynasty tales that comprise this film.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: With a focus on the pampered teenaged Jia Bao Yu, believed to be of supernatural origins, this Chinese classic depicts the Jia family's rise and fall.

programme.title: The Golden Knight
programme.desc: Veteran Yueh Feng made this 'Martial Arts World' saga of a masked master of the 'Black Sand Hand Technique,' starring Lily Ho in a dual role.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: Michael Hui Kwun-Man makes a hilarious film debut as the nuttiest warlord of early 20th Century China! Also stars Lily Ho, Hu Chin and Tina Ti.

programme.title: Let's Fall in Love
programme.desc: Pressured by his parents to marry prior to taking over his father's business, Guan rejects every girl they find but then, he stumbles upon the perfect one?

programme.title: The Dragon Creek
programme.desc: In one of her first roles, 'Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon' villain Cheng Pei Pei plays a kung-fu Nancy Drew who must face a secret serial killer.

programme.title: The Bride From Hell
programme.desc: After a bride-to-be is discovered to be possessed, justice must be done and an exorcism performed before anyone can rest in peace.

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: This heartwarming 1963 musical from Shaw Brothers tells the tale of a beautiful shepherdess, whose own problems drag her into a love triangle.

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: Seven seductive Spiders lie in wait for our faithful heroes in the third installment of the Shaw Brothers adaptation of Journey to the West.

programme.title: The Kid With the Golden Arm
programme.desc: Director Chang Cheh reunites the Five Venoms in his second biggest cult hit in the West, featuring Lo Meng's most memorable performance.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Chiang Li Ping plays a scorned wife, while Elaine Chin Yen Ling is the mistress who teaches the hypocritical husband that what goes around, comes around.

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: When Fang returns from the U.S. to see Rose but starts eyeing her old friend's fiance, Rose shows that she has a thorny side.

programme.title: The Village of No Return
programme.desc: Shu Qi, Wang Qian Yuan & Joseph Chang star in this tale of a priest who extracts villagers' painful memories using a magical helmet, creating a fool's paradise.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A retired bodyguard suffering from dementia finds a new friend in a little girl named Cherry. When her father's crime connections place her in danger, it is up to him to save her.

programme.title: Throw down
programme.desc: Johnnie To pays homage to his idol Akira Kurosawa in this all-star story of a former Judo champion who receives a second chance.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Hung Jen, struggling actor meets Hui Hsin, an associate producer who must write a script for a love story. He invites her out on a date as a research for her script and soon falls in love.

programme.title: All's Well, End's Well 2011
programme.desc: Claire works for Sammy, the CEO of a cosmetics company. She has a shot at a better life when a billionaire pursues her and asks Sammy for help- without realizing her feelings for him.

programme.title: Dr. Wai in the Scripture with No Words
programme.desc: Golden Horse Award winner for 'Best Visual Effects, this saga captures how a race begins when a former antiquarian goes in search of the lost, coveted Scripture with No Words.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: When a school bus driver is injured after risking his life to save a boy during an accident, the boy's father invites him to live with them. However, disturbing facts soon begin to emerge.

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: When a bribery trial is delayed after the defendant absconds & only witness goes missing, the ICAC launches a full-scale operation to track them down.

programme.title: Drink Drank Drunk
programme.desc: Due in court as a witness the next morning, Alan still gets raging drunk with friends the night before. Unexpectedly, this twilight haze leads to surprises.

programme.title: League of Gods
programme.desc: Jet Li, Tony Leung, Fan Bing Bing, Louis Koo, Huang Xiaoming, Angelababy & other big stars in this epic action-fantasy based on the novel, Fengshen Yanyi

programme.title: The Wedding Diary
programme.desc: A fisherman's son plans to marry the daughter of a rich developer. He promises a grand wedding but the cost is too high. He goes gambling and loses everything! Will the wedding go on?

programme.title: Rise of the Legend
programme.desc: The formative years of Wong Fei Hung see him defeat the Northern Sea's leader. Recognizing his talent, the Black Tiger's boss, Lei Gong, makes him his godson and one of his Four Tigers.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Soon after an important financial document is stolen from the computer of analyst Siu-yu, her boss receives an email demanding a relatively small ransom. Is this just the tip of an iceberg?

programme.title: Ready o/r Knot
programme.desc: A couple who first meet at a wedding & have been together for five years, question the institution of marriage from opposing viewpoints. Should marriage always be the 'next step.'?

programme.title: Happiness
programme.desc: Depicting a bond between a teen & a woman suffering from Alzheimer's, Kara Hui & Carlos Chan won the 2015 MIFF Best Actress & Best Supporting Actor awards.

programme.title: Dr. Wai in the Scripture with No Words
programme.desc: Golden Horse Award winner for 'Best Visual Effects, this saga captures how a race begins when a former antiquarian goes in search of the lost, coveted Scripture with No Words.

programme.title: Legend of the Demon Cat
programme.desc: Starring Huang Xuan & Liu Hao Ran, this winner of five awards tells the legend of a demon cat who disrupts the peace during the Tang Dynasty, causing a series of strange events.
After Mo Wan lost his true love, he is numb to other women. One day, he writes a story titled '2046', about a room that never changes, where people go to find their lost memories.

programme.title: Ghost Wife
programme.desc: This Thai horror flick depicts how a high school student dies during an abortion - and returns to haunt the apartment where she used to live.

programme.title: The Bullet Vanishes
programme.desc: Two cops stumble upon a conspiracy in the wake of the death of a girl accused of 'stealing bullets.'Risking their own lives, they set out to solve the mystery.

programme.title: The Yuppie Fantasia 3
programme.desc: Challenges in Leung Foon's life turn him into a chauvinist who hates himself. However, the arrival of his daughter spells a second chance at redemption.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: As business at his boxing studio begins to falter, Kit Fok, an unbeaten underground fighter, must take on a final match against an intimidating adversary to keep it alive.

programme.title: Miao Miao
programme.desc: An awkward young beauty enchants her outgoing classmate. Unfortunately, she falls in love with a someone else instead and decides to quietly pursue him.

programme.title: Justice Sung Sai Kit
programme.desc: Tat Ming Cheung meets a mysterious girl who takes him back in time to the Qing dynasty, where he rises to the role of famed judge Sung Sai Kit and restores justice to the land.

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: A woman is left by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. While finding her feet in her father's restaurant, she gets attracted to the new chef, a free spirit who helps liberate her.

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: Director John Woo gathers Chinese, Japanese & Korean superstars - Zhang Han Yu, Masaharu Fukuyama & Ha Ji Won - in this remake of the classic crime thriller.

programme.desc: Ellani menerima panggilan daripada Salwa. Belum sempat dia maklumkan kepada Salwa apa yang terjadi kepadanya, Mak Ngah Gayah datang merampas telefon dari tangan Ellani. Dituduh Ellani cuba kenakan dia lagi

programme.title: Cinta Koko Coklat
programme.desc: Pulang ke rumah, Damia dan Haikal masing-masing terganggu dengan apa yang dilihat di restoran tadi. Damia mula terfikir yang mungkin dia perlu beri Malik peluang kerana Malik begitu bersungguh-sungguh.

programme.title: Vish: a Poisonous Story
programme.desc: Sabrina menipu Ronnie dan mengeluarkan jantungnya. Alia nampak bentuk sebenar Sabrina. Alia membakar mati serangga berbisa Sabrina dan bersumpah untuk membalas dendam terhadap Sabrina.

programme.title: Supertots
programme.desc: RAKAN BUKU ANGKASA. Kapten Danny terus mengejek Sasha yang gemar berteman di Spacebook, rangkaian sosial galaksi yang paling popular. Sasha berharap agar Danny dapat merasakan apa yang dia rasakan.

programme.title: Tuan Rumah Pembantu Rumah
programme.desc: Areen menutup mata Erica kerana mereka berdua ternampak kejadian antara Inn dan Emir. Barulah Areen tahu yang Erica ialah anak Inn dan Catherine. Juria dan Anita pulang tetapi Erica melekap pada Areen

programme.title: Dia Yang Ku Cinta
programme.desc: Amna dan Luqman perang dingin. Akhirnya, Mak Su membuka cerita tentang Amna berjumpa dengan abang sepupunya. Luqman terkedu. Mahana mengamuk apabila mendapat tahu Hafiz berjumpa dengan Amna.

programme.title: Semanis Senyumanmu
programme.desc: Azim merancang untuk membuat kejutan sempena hari jadi Azra. Akhirnya Azra setuju untuk datang ke Sedap. Setelah melihat dekorasi Sedap yang sangat romantik, Azra takut yang Azim akan melamarnya lalu panik

programme.title: Buletin Utama

999 is a Malaysian investigative reality television series which focuses on crimes in the country.

programme.title: Aeon Bagaimana Kalau
programme.desc: Oleh kerana kesilapan sistem komputer, Alif, yang sepatutnya memulakan tugas sebagai Ketua Pegawai Teknologi di ibu pejabat AEON, telah dihantar bekerja sebagai Penolong Pengurus di pasaraya AEON.

programme.title: Tahyul
programme.desc: Sekumpulan pencipta kandungan dari laman sosial 'Tales Of Tahyul' telah merancang untuk merakam aktiviti paranormal di sebuah banglo usang. Namun, rancangan mereka itu hanyalah lakonan semata-mata.

programme.title: The Penthouse
programme.desc: Anak perempuan Oh Yoon Hee, Bae Ro Na bermimpi menjadi penyanyi lagu klasik. Ro Na diberhentikan sekolah kerana difitnah oleh Jenny. Keadaan itu membuat Yoon Hee teringat kejadian dia dan Cheon Seo Jin.

programme.title: Tak Beli Tak Cinta
programme.desc: Bibi telah mengadakan mesyuarat tergempar bagi tujuan mempersiapkan Stokisnya untuk menerima kunjungan Ikon Kosmetik. Bibi amat teruja sebab dia tahu impaknya pada Stokis Bibi akan menjadi hebat.

programme.title: Senang Terhibur
programme.desc: Shuk and Jihan bergabung dalam satu rancangan bersama artis-artis jemputan dengan pelbagai 'cabaran' and 'permainan' yang pasti membuatkan anda ketawa dan terhibur!

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: An old huntsman risks his life to protect a village girl from a group of treasure hunters after they witness the men commit murder.

programme.title: Masquerade
programme.desc: The story of the bizarre King Hwanghae and a look-a-like peasant, who stands in for the monarch when the King faces the threat of assassination.

programme.title: Where the Truth Lies
programme.desc: Two Korean-American students are accused of murder but the investigation is thrown into confusion when the two suspects present contradicting accounts and evidence, and blame each other for the crime.

programme.title: Lump of Sugar
programme.desc: A young girl is devastated when her best friend, a horse, is sold to another owner, but when they are reunited two years later they have a chance to create a miracle by teaming up in a race.

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: Music teacher Sang-Jin was asked to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation...

programme.title: The Himalayas
programme.desc: Based on true events, a renowned mountaineer sets out on a mission to Everest to retrieve his late junior climber's body and faces the greatest challenge of his life.

programme.title: The Classic
programme.desc: Ji-hae writes a love letter for her friend to a boy they both have a crush on. As the boy falls in love with her letters, she discovers that her mother also had a similar romance in the past.

programme.title: Boomerang Family
programme.desc: A peaceful household is disturbed by the return of a woman's three grown children one after the other - Eldest son Han-mo, second son In-mo, and double divorce daughter Mi-yun.

programme.title: The Big Swindle
programme.desc: Four con artists band together to perform a complex heist against the Bank of Korea, against the police, and against each other.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: A debt collector has liver cancer and has to get a liver transplant in 10 days. A seductive swindler agrees to donate her liver only if he tracks down the man who put her in prison.

programme.title: The Pirates
programme.desc: Right before the founding of the Joseon Dynasty, envoys from China lose the Royal Seal to a whale. A group of bandits attempt to retrieve it for a large reward and run into a group of pirates.

programme.title: Guimoon: the Lightless Door
programme.desc: As exorcist Do-jin heads over to an abandoned community center with rumors of strange deaths, he met 3 college students there to capture the rumored events and realised they're trapped...

programme.title: Like for Likes
programme.desc: An arrogant top star and a fussy screenwriter, a meddling chef and a homeless flight attendant, a deaf composer and TV drama producer. They learn to navigate the modern dating world via social media.

programme.title: Shoot Me in the Heart
programme.desc: A young man develops schizophrenia after his mother's suicide. After he meets a kindred spirit at the psychiatric hospital, he forges a plan with the man to escape.

programme.title: Yoga
programme.desc: Hyo-jung is insecure about her appearance. She joined the yoga academy wishing to restore beauty, yet strange things begin to unfold...

programme.title: Blood and Ties
programme.desc: A journalist suspects that her doting father may have been the culprit in a child abduction case 15 years ago, which the statute of limitations is set to expire soon.

programme.title: Lover'S Concerto
programme.desc: Anonymous love letters keep coming to Ji-hwan, refreshing his memories 5 years ago of two long-lost best friends, but when love rushed in, who will be left behind?

programme.title: Chronicle of a Blood Merchant
programme.desc: Set in the 1960's after the Korean War, a couple is happily married for 11 years until a rumor spreads around the village that the man isn't the real father of their eldest son......

programme.title: Man in Love
programme.desc: Tae-Il lives a fast life as low level thug. When he learns that he has a terminal illness without much time left to live, he falls in love for the first time.

programme.title: The City of Violence
programme.desc: When a detective returns to his hometown for an old friend's funeral, he gets mixed in with the local gangsters and teams up with his old friends to avenge his death.

programme.title: Gonjiam: Haunted Asylum
programme.desc: A handful of people are recruited to live stream a horror show at Gonjiam, Korea's most haunted hospital. To attract more viewers, scares are set up along the way, but soon things take a darker turn.

programme.title: Masquerade
programme.desc: The story of the bizarre King Hwanghae and a look-a-like peasant, who stands in for the monarch when the King faces the threat of assassination.

programme.title: The Closet
programme.desc: After losing his wife, a father tries to start over in a new home with his daughter. But things take a turn when strange noises trickle out of the closet, and his daughter goes missing.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective
programme.desc: A crime-enthusiast blogger and a veteran detective team up to prove the innocence of their mutual friend who's been framed for a horrific murder.

programme.title: EXchange Ep10
programme.desc: <EXchange> is a dating reality show where 4 ex couples reunite and live together. As they begin building relationships with each other, will they get back with their ex or date someone new?

programme.title: New Journey to the West 8 Ep06
programme.desc: The cast of New Journey To The West 7 is coming back with a new season of the series! Follow as they fulfill different missions and win dragon balls that make their dreams come true!

programme.title: Jirisan Ep03
programme.desc: Starring Jun Ji-hyun and Joo Ji-hoon, 'Jirisan' is a mystery drama that revolves around rangers that climb through Mountain Jiri, the tallest mountain in mainland South Korea.

programme.title: We Don't Bite Ep03
programme.desc: The 3 'villains' from <Penthouse> will have a special holiday in an empty house. They'll furnish the house to create their own hideout. Guests will join them and enjoy a healing time together.

programme.title: One Night Food Trip- International Edition 2 Ep04
programme.desc: Different Korean celebrities will team up with different Asian local stars, setting off a brand new round of gourmet journey in Philippines, Malaysia, Taiwan and Seoul!

programme.title: Street Woman Fighter: K-Dance Battle Ep08
programme.desc: Hosted by Kang Daniel, <Street Woman Fighter: K-Dance Battle> is a street dance survival show where 8 female dance crews compete to be No.1. BoA and NCT's Taeyong will join as judges.

programme.title: Jirisan Ep03
programme.desc: Starring Jun Ji-hyun and Joo Ji-hoon, 'Jirisan' is a mystery drama that revolves around rangers that climb through Mountain Jiri, the tallest mountain in mainland South Korea.

programme.title: Hotel Del Luna Ep09
programme.desc: Man-wol is an immortal and the CEO of Hotel Del Luna, a place for dead spirits to rest. She meets elite hotelier Chan-sung and starts to recall her sin that she committed 1000 years ago.
